text:
She sat on the ringside steps, huddled with her coaches and shed down tears of joy. The crowd cheered louder and more tears flowed out of champion’s eyes. That’s how Mary Kom celebrated her historic victory at the World Championships yesterday.
“We tried telling her, it’s okay. Calm down. Take deep breaths,” said coach Chhote Lal Yadav. “But she couldn’t. She said ‘Mujhse control nahi ho pa raha hai (I am not able to control it).”
AP
Bagging a gold medal for the sixth time, Mary Kom has become the first woman boxer to win six gold medals at the World Championships.
And everyone, including Bollywood celebrities, was proud of her.
